title: Family and friends to mourn Amir Locke at Minneapolis funeral after he was killed by police executing a no-knock warrant - CNN
content:
1. Family and friends to mourn Amir Locke at Minneapolis funeral after he was killed by police executing a no-knock warrant  CNN
  2. Funeral For Amir Locke To Be Held Amid Moratorium On No-Knock Warrants  NBC News
  3. Bishop of church hosting Amir Locke funeral says Mayor Frey won't be there, MPD leadership not welcome  Minneapolis Star Tribune
  4. SWAT officer in Locke shooting engaged in illegal search during previous raid  KSTP
  5. Amir Locke To Be Eulogized Thursday  WCCO - CBS Minnesota
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Members of the Minneapolis community will gather Thursday to honor the life of Amir Locke, a 22-year-old Black man whose killing at the hands of police during the execution of a no-knock warrant has reignited debate around the controversial practice.
